_sText:
Okey so to install the map go to standard:

c:/programs(x86)/steam/steamapps/steam-name/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps

IMPORTENT:
if you want this map on your server remember to have "net_maxfilesize 50+" cus the map is 40 mb so have to allow poeple download maps over 40 mb

there is 9 stages+bonus 

bonus level: the bonus level is extremely hard to comeplete but it is possible

Changelog:

V 2.0
-Added light
-Added custom props
-Fixed Bugs in purple level
-New screenshots (in spec mode this time)
